mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jobfair ( jobfair_no, jobfair_name, jobfair_date, jobfair_start, jobfair_end, jobfair_loc, jobfair_content, jobfair_limit, member_no ) VALUES ( jobfair_seq.nextval, #{jobfair_name, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, SYSDATE, #{jobfair_start, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{jobfair_end, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{jobfair_loc, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{jobfair_content, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{jobfair_limit, jdbcType=VARCHAR }, #{member_no } )
